issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Starting with the titanium 8.3.0.GA sdk, the global variables declared in app.js no longer work. I must do so that these global variables are visible in my modules, it is worth mentioning that in the 8.2.1.GA sdk it does not mark the error.
fields.environment:
SDK Version: 9.0.3.GA
- CLI Version: 8.0.0
- Node Version: v10.15.0
- JDK Version: 8.0.0
- XCode Version: 11.6
- Dev Environment OS + Version: macOS Catalina -v 10.15.6
- IDE + Version: Studio / Atom / VS Code: Axway Appcelerator Studio, build: 6.0.0.202005141803
- Mobile OS Version: 10
- Devices/Emulator: Android

comments.body: Fixed by declaring variables as globals
